about_the_game:
Official Soundtrack


First of all, thanks for purchasing Starlight: Eye of the Storm. In order to celebrate the full release launch, we've also included the Starlight: Eye of The Storm, Official Soundtrack, a DLC consisting 20 in-game music rearranged for your pleasure.

All songs are preserved in their mixing to retain the same characteristics they have while in-game!

You'll also get an uncompressed high quality version of the soundtrack with this purchase.

Thanks!
Jeremy (Composer)
detailed_description:
Official Soundtrack


First of all, thanks for purchasing Starlight: Eye of the Storm. In order to celebrate the full release launch, we've also included the Starlight: Eye of The Storm, Official Soundtrack, a DLC consisting 20 in-game music rearranged for your pleasure.

legal_notice:
Copyright


Copyright © 2017-2021.
STARLIGHT: EYE OF THE STORM
is wholly owned by Strides Interactive Game Studio Pte Ltd (Singapore). All rights reserved.

License


By purchasing this "Soundtrack" of 20 mp3 and 20 wave files, you're granted the rights to listen all the tracks. I cannot stop you from modifying or remixing the wave files but you must agree to the following:

  • All tracks must not be played in a public space without prior written permission.
  • All tracks may be downloaded and stored as a copy on your machine.
  • All tracks, unmodified in original, modified in full or partof cannot be resold, repackaged, relaunched, re-marketed, re-positioned or rebranded as a derivative commercial product. Fan work is permissible only if credit is given to the original composer.
  • All tracks, regardless of state, portion, duration, cut, remix must not be played via streaming on its own in whole or partof, without Starlight: Eye of the Storm as the game in focus. You may however, include any tracks in custom playlists to be played in other games if they're played privately, in a non-broadcasting fashion.

All Music and Soundtracks are composed, arranged and mixed by Jeremy Lee.
